<fo:region-body region-name="xsl-region-body" margin="20mm"/> <fo:region-after region-name="xsl-region-after" extent="20mm" padding-left="20mm" padding-right="20mm"/> </fo:simple-page-master> </fo:layout-master-set> <!-- Page --> <fo:page-sequence master-reference="A4" font-family="Calibri, Microsoft YaHei"> <!-- Footer --> <fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-after" font-size="11pt"> <fo:table> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(5)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell/> <fo:table-cell text-align="center"> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/Address/AddressDto"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Name"/> <xsl:if test="Street != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="Street"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="PlaceName != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="PlaceName"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="Zip != '' or City != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="Zip"/> <xfd:field xpath="City"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="CountryDisplayName != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="CountryDisplayName"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber != ''"> - Org.no: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber"/> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto"> <fo:block> <xsl:if test="Phone != ''"> Phone: <xfd:field xpath="Phone"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="Email != ''"> <xsl:if test="Phone != ''"> - </xsl:if> E-Mail: <xfd:field xpath="Email"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="Website != ''"> <xsl:if test="Phone != '' or Email != ''"> - </xsl:if> Homepage: <xfd:field xpath="Website"/> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> Page <fo:page-number format="1"/>/<fo:page-number-citation format="1" ref-id="xf#theEnd"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> padding-before="-15mm" space-after="10mm"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row height="30mm" font-size="24pt" font-weight="bold" display-align="after"> <!-- Header Logo --> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <fo:external-graphic fo:id="Logo" content-height="scale-down-to-fit" height="25mm" scaling="uniform"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <!-- Header Title --> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block font-size="24pt" font-weight="bold" id="Title">Reminder 1</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row height="5mm"> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="3"/> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <!-- Sub-Header Left --> <fo:table-cell> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Partner/Partner/Address/Address"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Name"/> </fo:block> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Street"/> </fo:block> <xsl:if test="PlaceName != ''"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="PlaceName"/> </fo:block> </xsl:if> <fo:block><xfd:field xpath="Zip"/> <xfd:field xpath="City"/></fo:block> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Country/Country/DisplayName"/> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> <!-- Sub-Header Right --> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> Date: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Transaction/EconomicTransaction/FiscalDate"/> </fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/PaymentMeans/PaymentMeans"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="LongDescription"/> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!-- Content --> <fo:block space-after="10mm"> <fo:block id="SubTitle">Missing payment reminder</fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block>During a review of our books we have noted that we have yet to recieve the payment for the due invoices below. This is why we send this reminder.</fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/PartnerPost/PartnerPostDto"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="50mm" margin-left="10mm"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Invoice:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Date:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="FiscalDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Due:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Amount:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/TotalAmount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </xsl:for-each> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block>Please ignore this reminder if you have paied the due amount within the last 5 workdays. If you have forgotten your invoices we would like to remind you to pay them as soon as possible.</fo:block> <fo:block id="SubTitle" space-before="5mm">Statement</fo:block> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="100%"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(3)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-header> <fo:table-row id="TableHeader"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Date</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Due</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Invoice</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Text</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Amount</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-header> <fo:table-body> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/UnsettledPartnerPosts/PartnerPostDto"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="FiscalDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="PostTypeTranslated"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Amount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell id="TableLine" number-columns-spanned="5"/> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Transaction/EconomicTransaction/LedgerPosts/LedgerPost"> <xsl:if test="LedgerAccount = 'Xena_Domain_Income_Accounts_Financial_Costs'"> <fo:block space-before="3mm"> Because of the late payment there will be added the following cost to your account: <xfd:field xpath="-Amount"/>. </fo:block> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </fo:block> <!-- InvoiceIdentification --> <xsl:if test="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Identifications/InvoiceIdentification"> <fo:block space-after="10mm" font-weight="bold" id="PaymentLines"> <fo:block>When paying, please use payment ID:</fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Identifications/InvoiceIdentification"> <fo:block><xfd:field xpath="Identification"/></fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:block> </xsl:if> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>

column-width="proportional-column-width(66)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(34)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <fo:external-graphic src="url(data:image/png;base64,i          )" content-width="1.917in" content-height="0.625in" scaling="uniform"/> </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.4cm">Edison Park 4</fo:block> <fo:block>DK-6715 Esbjerg N</fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.4cm"> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(80)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Tlf.</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>76 11 44 00</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Fax</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>76 11 44 01</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.4cm">www.martinsen.dk</fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.4cm">CVR-nr. 32 28 52 01</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="7.9cm" text-align="center" font-size="14pt" font-weight="bold"> <fo:block>Bogføringsbalance for perioden</fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.6cm"> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/PeriodFriendlyLong"/> </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="11pt" margin-top="1.2cm">uden periodiseringer af debitorer, kreditorer, varelager og</fo:block> <fo:block font-size="11pt">øvrige periodiseringer</fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="7cm" font-size="7pt">Martinsen • Statsautoriseret Revisionspartnerselskab</fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.2cm" font-size="7pt">Medlem af det landsdækkende samarbejde RevisorGruppen Danmark og det internationale PrimeGlobal</fo:block> </fo:block>
<!-- Content --> <fo:block break-before="page" font-size="11pt" margin-top="0.3cm"> <fo:block font-weight="bold" margin-top="0.5cm"> Revisors erklæring om opstilling af bogføringsbalance </fo:block> <fo:block font-weight="bold" margin-top="0.5cm"> Til <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/Address/AddressDto/Name"/> </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.5cm"> Vi har opstillet bogføringsbalancen for <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/Address/AddressDto/Name"/> for perioden <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/PeriodFriendlyLong"/> på grundlag af den af os foretagne bogføringog øvrige oplysninger modtaget fra Michael Staalsen. </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.5cm"> Bogføringsbalancen omfatter resultatopgørelse, aktiver og passiver. </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.5cm"> Vi har udført opgaven i overensstemmelse med ISRS 4410, Opgaver om opstilling af finansielle oplysninger. </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.5cm"> Vi har anvendt vores faglige ekspertise til at assistere Dem med at udarbejde og præsentere bogføringsbalancen i overensstemmelse med god bogføringsskik, idet vi dog henviser til bogføringsbalancens forside og omtalen af, at bogføringsbalancen er opstillet uden periodiseringer af debitorer, kreditorer, varelager og øvrige periodiseringer. Vi har overholdt relevante bestemmelser i revisorloven og FSR - danske revisorers Etiske regler for revisorer, herunder principper vedrørende integritet, objektivitet, faglig kompetence og fornøden omhu. </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.5cm"> Bogføringsbalancen samt nøjagtigheden og fuldstændigheden af de oplysninger, der er anvendt til opstillingen af bogføringsbalancen, er Deres ansvar. </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.5cm"> Da en opgave om opstilling af finansielle oplysninger ikke er en erklæringsopgave med sikkerhed, er vi ikke forpligtet til at verificere nøjagtigheden eller fuldstændigheden af de oplysninger, der er anvendt tilopstillingen af bogføringsbalancen. Vi udtrykker derfor ingen revisions- eller reviewkonklusion om, hvorvidt bogføringsbalancen er udarbejdet i overensstemmelse med god bogføringsskik. </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="0.5cm"> Bogføringsbalancen er udelukkende tiltænkt til Deres brug og kan være uegnet til andre formål, herunder eksempelvis anvendelse som kreditgivningsgrundlag. </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="1.2cm"> Esbjerg N, den <xfd:field xpath="$XFCrtLocalDateTime" format="date:dd. MMMM yyyy"/> </fo:block> <fo:block font-weight="bold" margin-top="0.7cm"> Martinsen </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="7pt"> Statsautoriseret Revisionspartnerselskab </fo:block> <fo:block margin-top="2.8cm"> Lars Æbelø-Nielsen </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="7pt"> Statsautoriseret revisor </fo:block> </fo:block>

<fo:block>The goods will be delivered once this invoice has been paid.</fo:block> </fo:block> </xsl:if> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>

<!-- End total --> <fo:table-row border-top-width="0.25pt" border-top-style="solid"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block></fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Totals/Specification/Balance" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Totals/Specification/BalanceDue" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row>

id="Title">Reminder 1</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row height="5mm"> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="3"/> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <!-- Sub-Header Left --> <xfd:field xpath="Country/Country/DisplayName"/> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> <!-- Sub-Header Right --> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> Date: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Transaction/EconomicTransaction/FiscalDate"/> </fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/PaymentMeans/PaymentMeans"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="LongDescription"/> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!-- Content --> <fo:block space-after="10mm"> <fo:block id="SubTitle">Missing payment reminder</fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block>During a review of our books we have noted that we have yet to recieve the payment for the due invoices below. This is why we send this reminder.</fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/PartnerPost/PartnerPostDto"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="50mm" margin-left="10mm"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Invoice:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Date:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="FiscalDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Due:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Amount:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Amount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </xsl:for-each> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block>Please ignore this reminder if you have paied the due amount within the last 5 workdays. If you have forgotten your invoices we would like to remind you to pay them as soon as possible.</fo:block> <fo:block id="SubTitle" space-before="5mm">Statement</fo:block> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="100%"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(3)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-header> <fo:table-row id="TableHeader"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Date</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Due</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Invoice</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Text</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Amount</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-header> <fo:table-body> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/UnsettledPartnerPosts/PartnerPostDto"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="FiscalDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="PostTypeTranslated"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Amount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell id="TableLine" number-columns-spanned="5"/> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Transaction/EconomicTransaction/LedgerPosts/LedgerPost"> <xsl:if test="LedgerAccount = 'Xena_Domain_Income_Accounts_Financial_Costs'"> <fo:block space-before="3mm"> Because of the late payment there will be added the following cost to your account: <xfd:field xpath="-Amount"/>. </fo:block> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </fo:block> <!-- InvoiceIdentification --> <xsl:if test="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Identifications/InvoiceIdentification"> <fo:block space-after="10mm" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" id="PaymentLines"> font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold"> <fo:block>Betalingsfrist</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block border-bottom="1px solid black"> <fo:table border-collapse="collapse" width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(84)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(16)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block>Salgsmoms (udgående moms)</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="-1*sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_Sales']/TotalAmount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block>Moms af varekøb i udlandet (både EU og tredjelande)</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="-1*sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_EUVat_Goods']/TotalAmount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Moms af ydelseskøb i udlandet med omvendt betalingspligt</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="-1*sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_EUVat_Services']/TotalAmount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table>  </fo:block>
<fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block> <fo:inline font-size="14pt" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold">Fradrag</fo:inline> </fo:block> <fo:block border-bottom="1px solid black"> <fo:table border-collapse="collapse" width="auto" table-layout="fixed" margin-right="1.915in"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(75)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(25)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block>Købsmoms (Indgående moms)</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_Purchasing']/TotalAmount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/TaxPosts/TaxSettlementPostDto" padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="LedgerTagDescription"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="TotalAmount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat> </fo:table-body> </fo:table>  </fo:block>
<fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block border-bottom="1px solid black"> <fo:table border-collapse="collapse" width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(84)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(16)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row padding="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block>Moms i alt (positivt beløb = betale, negativt beløb = penge tilgode)</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="-1*(sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_Sales']/TotalAmount) + sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_EUVat_Goods']/TotalAmount)+ sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_EUVat_Services']/TotalAmount)) - sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_Purchasing']/TotalAmount) - sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/TaxPosts/TaxSettlementPostDto/TotalAmount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table>  </fo:block>
<fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block padding-after="2pt"> <fo:inline font-size="14pt" font-weight="bold" font-family="Calibri">Supplerende oplysninger </fo:inline> </fo:block> <fo:block> <fo:table border-collapse="collapse" width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(84)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(16)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block> <fo:inline>Rubrik A - varer. </fo:inline> <fo:inline font-style="italic" font-family="Calibri" font-size="8pt">Værdien uden moms af varekøb i andre EU-lande (EU-erhvervelser).</fo:inline> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_EUVat_Goods']/Basis)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <fo:inline>Rubrik A - ydelser. </fo:inline> <fo:inline font-style="italic" font-family="Calibri" font-size="8pt">Værdien uden moms af ydelseskøb i andre EU-lande.</fo:inline> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto[VatType='VatType_EUVat_Services']/Basis)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block> <fo:inline>Rubrik B - varer. </fo:inline> <fo:inline font-style="italic" font-family="Calibri" font-size="8pt">Indberettes til "EU-salg uden moms". Værdien af varesalg uden moms til andre EU-lande.</fo:inline> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="-1*sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/EUVATFreeSales/VatFreeSalesTotalData[EUVatType='EUType_Goods']/Amount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block> <fo:inline>Rubrik B - varer. </fo:inline> <fo:inline font-style="italic" font-family="Calibri" font-size="8pt">Indberettes ikke til "EU salg uden moms". Værdien af fx installation og montage, fjernsalg og nye transportmidler til ikke momsregistrerede kunder uden moms til andre EU-lande.</fo:inline> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="-1*sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/EUVATFreeSales/VatFreeSalesTotalData[EUVatType='EUType_Services']/Amount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell > <fo:block> <fo:inline>Rubrik B - ydelser. </fo:inline> <fo:inline font-style="italic" font-family="Calibri" font-size="8pt">Værdien af visse ydelsessalg uden moms til andre EU-lande. Indberettes til "EU-salg uden moms".</fo:inline> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="-1*sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/EUVATFreeSales/VatFreeSalesTotalData[EUVatType='EUType_None']/Amount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row padding-after="2pt"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <fo:inline>Rubrik C. </fo:inline> <fo:inline font-style="italic" font-family="Calibri" font-size="8pt">Værdien af andre varer og ydelser, der leveres uden afgift her i landet, i andre EU-lande og i lande uden for EU. Se Momsbekendtgørelsen § 79, stk. 7, jf. § 76, stk. 10.</fo:inline> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="-1*sum(/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/NonEUVATFreeSales/VatFreeSalesTotalData/Amount)" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:," /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table>  </fo:block>
</fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>

<xfd:attribute-value object="Logo" attribute="fo:src" dynamic-value="concat('data:image/jpg;base64,',/Report/Logo)"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="FiscalSetupName" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="FiscalSetupOrgNo" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="PrintDate" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TitleCell" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/InvertedTextColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TitleCell" attribute="fo:background-color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TitleFooter" attribute="fo:background-color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="PostsHeader" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/DarkHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="AccountHeader" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/DarkHighlightTextColour"/>
<xfd:attribute-value object="debetAmount" attribute="fo:visibility" condition="string-length(normalize-space(LedgerPost/LedgerPostDto/Amount)) < 0" value="hidden"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="creditAmount" attribute="fo:visibility" condition="string-length(normalize-space(LedgerPost/LedgerPostDto/Amount)) > 0" value="hidden"/>

<!-- Body --> <fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body"> <!-- Header --> <fo:block> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block height="3cm"> <fo:external-graphic src="url()" content-height="scale-down-to-fit" id="Logo" height="3cm" width="100%" scaling="uniform"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block font-size="24pt" id="FiscalSetupName"> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/Address/AddressDto/Name"/> </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="14pt" line-height="21pt" id="FiscalSetupOrgNo"> Org. no: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber"/> </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="42pt" id="PrintDate"> Printed: <xfd:field xpath="$XFCrtLocalDateTime"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block>
<!-- Content --> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="15pt"> <!-- Title and criteria table --> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(15)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(35)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(15)" column-number="3"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(35)" column-number="4"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row height="1,05cm"> <fo:table-cell padding="2pt" number-columns-spanned="4" display-align="center" text-align="center" id="TitleCell"> <fo:block font-size="14pt"> VAT settlement </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block > Periode begin: </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPeriodStartDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> VoucherNo: </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/SettlementVoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Periode end:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPeriodEndDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Due date:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row height="2pt" padding-after="1,5cm"> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="4" id="TitleFooter"></fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block>
<!-- Posts --> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="13pt"> <fo:table padding-bottom="30px"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="3"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="4"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="5"/> <fo:table-body>
<!-- Columnheaders --> <fo:table-row id="PostsHeader"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>VAT#</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right">Basis</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right">VAT amount</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right">Primo adjust.</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right">Total</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row>
<!-- Posts --> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VatAbbreviation"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xfd:field xpath="Basis" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xfd:field xpath="AmountSettled" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xfd:field xpath="PrimoAdjustment" format="number:#.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xfd:field xpath="TotalAmount" format="number:#.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat>
<!-- Total --> <fo:table-row border-top-width="0.25pt" border-top-style="solid" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" > <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2"> <fo:block>Total for the periode:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/TotalSettled" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row>
</fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xfd:document xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" xmlns:xfd="http://www.ecrion.com/xfd/1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xf="http://www.ecrion.com/xf/1.0" xmlns:xc="http://www.ecrion.com/2008/xc" xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fo:font-family="Times" fo:font-size="12pt" sample-xml=".\ExampleData\Xena_Reports_DefaultXSLT_ArticlePostReportList.xml"> <xfd:localization> <xfd:locale language-id="da_DK" language-name="Danish"/> </xfd:localization>

<!-- Footer --> <fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-after"> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="20pt"> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="1" /> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="2" /> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row border-top-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" border-top-color="rgb(0,0,0)"> <fo:table-cell display-align="center"> <fo:block>List of margins by article</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell display-align="center" text-align="right"> <fo:block> <fo:page-number format="1" />/<fo:page-number-citation format="1" ref-id="xf#theEnd" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> </fo:static-content>
<fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body">
<!-- Header --> <fo:block> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block height="3cm"> <fo:external-graphic src="url()" content-height="scale-down-to-fit" id="Logo" height="3cm" width="100%" scaling="uniform"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block font-size="24pt" id="FiscalSetupName"> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/Address/AddressDto/Name"/> </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="14pt" line-height="21pt" id="FiscalSetupOrgNo"> Org. no.: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber"/> </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="42pt" id="PrintDate"> Printed: <xfd:field xpath="$XFCrtLocalDateTime"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block>
<!-- Content --> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="15pt"> <!-- Title and criteria table --> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(30)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20)" column-number="3"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(30)" column-number="4"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row height="1,05cm"> <fo:table-cell padding="2pt" number-columns-spanned="4" display-align="center" text-align="center" id="TitleCell"> <fo:block font-size="14pt"> List of margin for article </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> From date: </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/DateFromFriendly/text()"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> To date: </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/DateToFriendly/text()"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <xsl:if test="count(/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/ArticleGroup/ArticleGroupDto)>0"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Articlegroup:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/ArticleGroup/ArticleGroupDto/Description" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="count(/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Article/ArticleDto)>0"> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Article:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Article/ArticleDto/Abbreviation" /> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Article/ArticleDto/Description" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </xsl:if> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <xsl:if test="count(/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Department/DepartmentDto)>0"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Department:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Department/DepartmentDto/Description" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="count(/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Bearer/BearerDto)>0"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Bearer:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Bearer/BearerDto/Description" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="count(/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Purpose/PurposeDto)>0"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Purpose:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Criteria/Specification/Purpose/PurposeDto/Description" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xsl:if> </fo:table-row>
<fo:table-row height="2pt" padding-after="1,5cm"> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="4" id="TitleFooter"></fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block>
<!-- Posts --> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="13pt"> <fo:table padding-bottom="30px"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(30.0)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(13.0)" column-number="3"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(13.0)" column-number="4"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(13.0)" column-number="5"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(11.0)" column-number="6"/> <fo:table-body>
<!-- Columnheaders --> <fo:table-row id="PostsHeader" border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-bottom-style="solid"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Article#</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Description</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Turnover</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Consumption</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Margin</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Ratio</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row>
<!-- Posts --> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Details/ArticleMarginData"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="ArticleNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="ArticleDescription" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Turnover" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Consumption" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Margin" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="MarginRatio" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat>
<!-- Totals --> <fo:table-row id="PostsHeader" border-top-width="0.25pt" border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-bottom-style="solid"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Totals:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block></fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Turnover" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Consumption" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Margin" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/MarginRatio" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row>
</fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>
